sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ xué Zhōngwén duōjiǔ le?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Depuis combien de temps apprends-tu le chinois ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: How long have you been learning Chinese?

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 多数人都同意这个决定。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Duōshù rén dōu tóngyì zhège juédìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La majorité des gens sont d'accord avec cette décision.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Most people agree with this decision.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ fāxiàn le yī gè wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai découvert un problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I discovered a problem.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们去那家饭馆吃饭吧。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen qù nà jiā fànguǎn chīfàn ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons manger dans ce restaurant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go eat at that restaurant.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gāngcái yǒu rén dǎ diànhuà zhǎo nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelqu'un t'a appelé tout à l'heure.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Someone called for you just now.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de kǎoshì fēnshù hěn gāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son score à l'examen est très élevé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His exam score is very high.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他在很多方面都很优秀。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài hěn duō fāngmiàn dōu hěn yōuxiù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est excellent dans de nombreux domaines.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is excellent in many aspects.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī jiā gāojí cāntīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est un restaurant haut de gamme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a high-end restaurant.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng guānjī huò tiáo chéng jìngyīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez éteindre ou mettre en mode silencieux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please turn off or switch to silent mode.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zuò gōnggòng qìchē qù xuéxiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je prends le bus pour aller à l'école.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I take the bus to school.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen qù gōngyuán sànbù ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons nous promener dans le parc.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go for a walk in the park.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gùkè yǒngyuǎn shì duì de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le client a toujours raison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The customer is always right.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tiān'ānmén Guǎngchǎng hěn dà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La place Tiananmen est très grande.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Tiananmen Square is very large.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Diànshì shàng de guǎnggào tài duō le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a trop de publicités à la télévision.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are too many advertisements on TV.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàtiān wǒ xǐhuan qù hǎibiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En été, j'aime aller à la plage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to go to the beach in summer.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qiūtiān shùyè biàn huáng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En automne, les feuilles deviennent jaunes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In autumn, the leaves turn yellow.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā chuān le yī jiàn hóng yīfu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle porte un vêtement rouge.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is wearing a red outfit.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Běijīng yǒu hěn duō guójì xuéxiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pékin a beaucoup d'écoles internationales.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Beijing has many international schools.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng huàn yī gè fángjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais changer de chambre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to change to a different room.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng chūshì nǐ de hùzhào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez montrer votre passeport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please show your passport.
